GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15.53 to before v5.15.53
GSD.description:
net: tun: avoid disabling NAPI twice

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.53 by commit c28f955155037586132f8aad573e06a41d260038, it was introduced in version v5.15.53 by commit 92e4f3ee5831e025a5bcd81782b1d41b27a90c52. For more details please see the references link.
